name: Md Iqbal Hossaion
comment: Excellent food. Menu is extensive and seasonal to a particularly high standard. Definitely fine dining.

name: Nabila Mim
comment: Amaazing food! The whole experience from start to finish is great waitress is always so friendly and kind. The food canâ€™t get better and the prices are fair for the portion size. Always a great spot to get great food.

name: Juboraj Islam Mamun
comment: Absolutely amazing! The place is beautiful and staff are super friendly and the food is delicious. I love that you get a lot of food as well for the price

name: Binta Islam Fahi
comment: The menus options are an excellent value. The dining experience overall is very pleasant. I highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Rafsan Bin Rasel
comment: Absolutely amazing! The place is beautiful and staff are super friendly and the food is delicious

name: Taiaba Alom
comment: Everything about this restaurant was great. The place was clean and smelled good. The staff and greeter was very nice
